abstract: It’s the spill that keeps on spilling. BP has shown us the limits of human endeavor trying to cap its pipe in the gulf, but The Times says the oil giant has another leak to deal with: its chief executive’s diatribes. If Tony Hayward goes, so does all the fun! Meanwhile, the AgBank initial public offering is looming on the horizon; Spain’s bank consolidation is afoot; and global banking rules are said to be advancing.

lead_paragraph: It’s the spill that keeps on spilling. BP has shown us the limits of human endeavor trying to cap its pipe in the gulf, but The Times says the oil giant has another leak to deal with: its chief executive’s diatribes. If Tony Hayward goes, so does all the fun!  Meanwhile, the AgBank initial public offering is looming on the horizon; Spain’s bank consolidation is afoot; and global banking rules are said to be advancing.
